峵字的基本解释

峵
róng
古同“嵘”。

峵字的汉语字典释义
暂无汉字(峵)的汉语大字典的解释
峵字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　峵； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页312第03
【集韻】乎萌切，音閎。與嶸?同。崝嶸也。【說文】本作嶸，或作峵?。【王延壽·魯靈光殿賦】鬱坱圠以嶒峵。【註】嶒峵，上潤而險也。　【正字通】字彙汎云山也，分嶸峵爲二，誤。

峵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
峵字的起名意思

古同“嵘”，形容山势高峻，不平凡或不平常。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　峵; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 312 03
【Ji Yun】Almost cute and cut, sound Hong. Same as Rong? Korong also. [Said the text] This is a rong, or a 峵?. [Wang Yanshou·Lu Lingguang Temple Fu] Yutuoyu Yidongao. [Note] Zhangtong, the upper is smooth but dangerous.　【Zhengzitong】The vocabulary is in Yunshan, and the sub-rong 峵 is two, which is wrong.

Name meaning
In ancient times, "Rong" used to describe mountains that were high and steep, extraordinary or extraordinary.
